Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 17th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1973...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 2/3/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $880,000 per year...
Injured on 7/20/1983 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won World Championship with Pittsburgh in 1986...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/13/1988 to a 3-year deal worth $638,400 per year...
Released by Halifax on 4/7/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 5/20/1990 to a minor league deal...
